abstract: Maricopa County, Ariz, Sheriff Joe Arpaio claims that his former lawyer Tim Casey arranged to have private investigator look into wife of Judge Murray Snow, who is presiding over Arpaio's contempt of court case.
lead_paragraph: Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County claimed that his ex-lawyer had hired an investigator to look into the wife of the federal judge presiding over a contempt of court case against the sheriff.

headline.main: Arizona: Sheriff Says His Ex-Lawyer Arranged Inquiry Into Judge’s Wife
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Sheriff Says His Ex-Lawyer Arranged Inquiry Into Judge’s Wife

snippet: Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County claimed that his ex-lawyer had hired an investigator to look into the wife of the federal judge presiding over a contempt of court case against the sheriff.
